import './SideNav.css'; import React ,{useState} from 'react' import {Link,Outlet,useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import Login from '../Login/Login'; const SideNav = () => { const navigate=useNavigate(); function handleClick(path){ navigate(path); } function refreshforlogout(){ window.location.reload(false); } const [token,setToken]=useState(); if(!token) { return } return (
  • handleClick("Salesparent")}> Point Of Sales
  • handleClick("Warehouse")}> Warehouse
  • handleClick("Dashboard")}> Dashboard
  • handleClick("Salary")}> Salary
  • handleClick("updatesales")}> Edit Sales
  • handleClick("Expenses")}> Add Expenses
  • Logout
) } export default SideNav;
